title: Bug 6410 - File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410 - File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: The file is marked as dirtied by the code assist feature, even though no changes have been made. As a result, the code assist feature does not appear.
SR:
1. Open the file in the code editor. 
2. Trigger the code assist feature (e.g., by pressing a specific key combination or using a menu option). 
3. Notice that the file is marked as dirtied, although no changes have been made. 
4. Verify that the code assist feature does not appear.
